definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: The mine shaft sinking with a mine shaft drilling is a reliable mine shaft construction method to pass through a deep and thick alluvium.
sentences.chinese: 钻井法凿井是通过深厚冲积层最可靠的竖井施工方法。

sentences.english: The security of freezing wall is the key problem of freezing shaft sinking in deep alluvium.
sentences.chinese: 冻结壁的安全性是深厚冲积层中冻结凿井的关键问题。

sentences.english: Study on the thickness of frozen wall in deep alluvium;
sentences.chinese: 冻结壁的安全性是深厚冲积层中冻结凿井的关键问题。

sentences.english: Three kinds of different coal seams be found under the huge and thick water contained alluvium in a certain mine.
sentences.chinese: 在某矿巨厚含水冲积层下，有三种不同产状的煤层。

sentences.english: The upper part of the main river alluvium in modern times, the lower the pour-shaped alluvium.
sentences.chinese: 上部主要是近代河流冲积层，下部为倾状冲积层。

sentences.english: The upper part of the main river alluvium in modern times, the lower the pour-shaped alluvium.
sentences.chinese: 上部主要是近代河流冲积层，下部为倾状冲积层。

sentences.english: This saphire deposit is occurred in the Holocene alluvium.
sentences.chinese: 矿床赋存于全新统冲积层。

definition: holocene system (geological strata laid down during the last 12000 years)
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
